INPUTS

TEXT INPUT

Default Text Input 
<fieldset>
    <legend>Default Text Input</legend>
    <div class="text-input-container">
        <input type="text" id="first-name" name="first-name" title="First Name" />
        <label for="first-name">First Name</label>
    </div>
    <div class="text-input-container">
        <input type="text" id="last-name" name="last-name" title="Last Name" />
        <label for="last-name">Last Name</label>
    </div>
</fieldset>

    </div>
</fieldset>

Please select a value

    <legend>Error Select Input</legend>
    <div class="select-container error">
        <select id="select3" name="select3" title="Error Select">
            <option value="1">Option 1</option>
            <option value="2">Option 2</option>
            <option value="3">Option 3</option>
            <option value="4">Option 4</option>
        </select>
        <label for="select3">Error Select</label>

    </div>
</fieldset>

COUNTER

 
<!-- HTML SNIPPET -->
<div id="counterId" class="counter-input">
    <label>Optional Label</label>
</div>

/* JAVASCRIPT SNIPPET */
// Callback function for when input is provided
var callback = function(value) {
    // Perform action on value
    ...
};

// Optional parameters
var options = {
    initialValue: 3, // set initial value, default is 1
    min: 2, // set a minimum allowed value
    max: 5 // set a maximum allowed value
};

// Initialize CounterInput via ID with callback and options
new CounterInput('counterId').init(callback, options);
 
<!-- HTML SNIPPET -->
<div id="counterId" class="counter-input lg">
    <label>Optional Label</label>
</div>
 
<!-- HTML SNIPPET -->
<div id="counterId" class="counter-input sm">
    <label>Optional Label</label>
</div>
 
<!-- HTML SNIPPET -->
<div id="counterId" class="counter-input" aria-disabled="true">
    <label>Optional Label</label>
</div>
 
<!-- HTML SNIPPET -->
<div id="counterId" class="counter-input" aria-invalid="true">
    <label>Optional Label</label>
</div>

DROPDOWNS

 
<!-- HTML SNIPPET -->
<div id="dropdownId" class="dropdown-list">
    <label>Optional Label</label>
</div>

/* JAVASCRIPT SNIPPET */
// Array of list items
var listItems = [
    { 
        display: 'Optional Placeholder', // Display string to show in list
        value: null // Value of selected item
    },
    { 
        display: 'Item1', // Display string to show in list
        value: 'item-1' // Value of selected item
    },
    { 
        display: 'Item2', // Display string to show in list
        value: 'item-2', // Value of selected item
        selected: true // Set as default selected value
    }
];

// Callback function for when an item is selected
var selectedCallback = function(value) {
    // receives the 'value' property of item
    console.log(value);
};

// Initialize DropdownList via ID with listItems and callback 
new DropdownList('dropdownId').init(listItems, selectedCallback);
						
<!-- HTML SNIPPET -->
<div id="dropdownId" class="dropdown-list" aria-disabled="true">
    <label>Disabled Dropdown</label>
</div>
 
<!-- HTML SNIPPET -->
<div id="dropdownId" class="dropdown-list" aria-invalid="true">
    <label>Error Dropdown</label>
</div>
 
<!-- HTML SNIPPET -->
<div id="dropdownId" class="dropdown-list">
    <label>Set Selected Item by Index</label>
</div>

/* JAVASCRIPT SNIPPET */
// Initialize Dropdown
var dropdown = new DropdownList('dropdownId');
dropdown.init(listItems, selectedCallback);

// Set selected item to index 2
dropdown.setSelectedIndex(2);

CHECKBOX

Single Checkbox

Single Checkbox

 
<!-- HTML SNIPPET -->
<h4>Single Checkbox</h4>
<div role="checkbox" aria-checked="false" tabindex="0" id="cb1">
    <label>Value Option 1</label>
</div>

/* JAVASCRIPT SNIPPET */
new Checkbox('cb1').init();
Default Checkbox (Vertical)

Checkbox Group (Vertical)

 
<!-- HTML SNIPPET -->
<div class="checkbox-group" id="cbg1">
    <h4>Checkbox Group (Vertical)</h4>
    <div role="checkbox" class="select-all" aria-checked="mixed" tabindex="0" id="cond0">
        <label>Select All</label>
    </div>
    <div role="checkbox" aria-checked="true" tabindex="-1" id="cond1">
        <label>Value Option 1</label>
    </div>
    <div role="checkbox" aria-checked="false" tabindex="-1" id="cond2">
        <label>Value Option 2</label>
    </div>
    <div role="checkbox" aria-checked="false" tabindex="-1" id="cond3">
        <label>Value Option 3</label>
    </div>
    <div role="checkbox" aria-checked="false" tabindex="-1" id="cond4">
        <label>Value Option 4</label>
    </div>
</div>

/* JAVASCRIPT SNIPPET */
new CheckboxGroup('cbg1').init();

TOGGLE

Default Toggle Off
Default Toggle On 
<fieldset>
    <legend>Default Toggle Off</legend>
    <div class="toggle-container">
        <input type="checkbox" id="toggle1" name="switchgroup1" title="Toggle1" class="toggle">
        <label for="toggle1"><span>Default Toggle Off</span></label>
    </div>
    <legend>Default Toggle On</legend>
    <div class="toggle-container">
        <input checked type="checkbox" id="toggle2" name="switchgroup1" title="Toggle2" class="toggle">
        <label for="toggle2"><span>Default Toggle On</span></label>
    </div>
</fieldset>
Disabled Toggle 
<fieldset>
    <legend>Disabled Toggle</legend>
    <div class="toggle-container">
        <input disabled type="checkbox" id="toggle3" name="switchgroup2" title="Toggle3" class="toggle">
        <label for="toggle3"><span>Disabled Toggle Off</span></label>
    </div>
    <div class="toggle-container">
        <input disabled checked type="checkbox" id="toggle4" name="switchgroup2" title="Toggle4" class="toggle">
        <label for="toggle4"><span>Disabled Toggle On</span></label>
    </div>
</fieldset>
